thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Property Management Industry News
thread.title: ARL posts 2Q profit

title: ARL posts 2Q profit
text:
DALLAS (AP) _ American Realty Investors Inc. (ARL) on Wednesday reported second-quarter net income of $1.2 million. 
On a per-share basis, the Dallas-based company said it had net income of 5 cents. 
The real estate investment company posted revenue of $24.2 million in the period. 
ARL shares have risen 17 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Wednesday, shares hit $6.40, an increase of nearly 8 percent in the last 12 months. 

This story was generated by Automated Insights (http://automatedinsights.com/ap) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on ARL at http://www.zacks.com/ap/ARL
